name: MXC Knife
description: The MXC Knife is equivalent to Tier 2 Tech like the Iron Knife , giving Prospectors the ability to skin larger animals, such as Buffalo and Grizzly Bears . Unlike Throwing Knives , the MXC Knife cannot be thrown. There currently are no Workshop throwing knives.
crafted_at: Workshop Repair Kitat a poweredRepair Bench
